remarks.para: A group of tasks cooperate by moving through a series of phases, where each in the group signals it has arrived at the in a given phase and implicitly waits for all others to arrive. The same can be used for multiple phases.

summary.para: Enables multiple tasks to cooperatively work on an algorithm in parallel through multiple phases.
